keyMoments.title: Escaping Marine Pursuit
keyMoments.description: The crew works together to escape from Hina's Marine forces using Luffy's creative use of metal pipes.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ability to work together in crisis situations.

keyMoments.title: Nico Robin Joins the Crew
keyMoments.description: Robin becomes the seventh member of the Straw Hat Pirates after convincing Luffy to let her join.
keyMoments.significance: Major milestone - the crew gains its archaeologist and seventh member. Robin is unique as she invited herself rather than being invited.

keyMoments.title: First Seven-Member Crew Lineup
keyMoments.description: Robin is shown standing in the official Straw Hat Pirates crew lineup for the first time, marking her official position as the seventh member.
keyMoments.significance: Visual confirmation of Robin's membership and the crew's growth to seven members.
